extensionDescription.message: Provides custom search field for smart keywords (bookmark keywords).

switchToRecentlyUsed.tooltip.message: Switch to engines ordeded by Recently Used (Ctrl/⌘ - ←)

switchToAll.tooltip.message: Switch to engines ordeded by Name (Ctrl/⌘ - →)

config.recycleBlankCurrentTab.label.message: Recycle current blank tab, instead of new tab

config.recycleTabUrlPattern.label.message: Recycle more tabs with URI matchis to following regular expression:

config.defaultEngine.label.message: Default search engine when nothing item is selected ("%s" will be replaced to the search term):

config.favIconProvider.label.message: Icon provider ("%s" will be replaced to the origin part of the bookmark's URI:
